author: timbeiko
content:
**EIP-1559 Implementers' Call #3 is scheduled for June 24th, 19:00 UTC**

Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/184
Call will be streamed on YT and zoom link will be posted in the <#692078615269212180> channel before. 

The goals for the call would be to get to a resolution on if and how we want to bundle 1559 and escalator fees (for now), and how we go about testing/analyzing the fee market changes. Feel free to leave comments to add things to the agenda.

Edit: date changed from the 25th to the 24th.

author: madeof_tin7509
content: But looking forward to catching up when I get back
